Name: ROBOCOCK
About the game: Far future. All maral principles have been erased, complete debauchery and chaos are happening on the streets. An unknown company creates an advanced robot to fight depravity and lust in the name of family values. Take on the role of a robot cop called ROBOMEMB. Walk the tool of justice through the dirty streets of the city of the future. Great graphics and old school console style atmosphere. Use a variety of weapons with unique properties, fight dangerous bosses and cleanse the city of all this lust! Game Features: Graphics and sound in the style of 80-90s consoles; A wide variety of weapons with unique properties; Gameplay with puzzle and metroidvania elements; Hardcore gameplay for the most experienced players;
